org.fluidity.deployment.osgi

Interface BundleComponents.Status

  • Enclosing interface:
    BundleComponents

    public static interface BundleComponents.Status
    OSGi service to query about managed component states in this bundle. Each bundle that uses a dependency injection container to manage OSGi related components will register an instance for this service interface, identifying the instance using the BUNDLE property with the bundle's symbolic name as its value.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String BUNDLE
      Used as a service registration property to identify the instance of this service for a particular bundle.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<Class<?>> active()
      Returns the list of active components.
      Collection<Class<?>> failed()
      Returns the list of components that failed to start.
      Map<Class<?>,Collection<Service>> inactive()
      Returns the list of components that are waiting for OSGi services to start, along with the descriptor of the services they each are waiting to start.

    • Field Detail

      • BUNDLE

        static final String BUNDLE
        Used as a service registration property to identify the instance of this service for a particular bundle. The value of the property is the symbolic name of the bundle that exports the status service.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • active

        Collection<Class<?>> active()
        Returns the list of active components.
        Returns:
        a list of Class objects.

      • inactive

        Map<Class<?>,Collection<Service>> inactive()
        Returns the list of components that are waiting for OSGi services to start, along with the descriptor of the services they each are waiting to start.
        Returns:
        a list of Class objects.

      • failed

        Collection<Class<?>> failed()
        Returns the list of components that failed to start.
        Returns:
        a list of Class objects.
